Text: Helt korrekt efter danskeren Sven Hazels succesroman "Døden på Larvefødder". En rigtig god film for drengerøve.

based on the true exploits of sven hassel, a swedish citizen imprisoned in germany, he was forced to join a penal panzer battalion and fought all over russia and europe....great books.....great film please seed....and many thanks kefissos.....cheers..

Sven Hazel was NOT Swedish, but Danish. Why do people around the world always think Swedish and Danish is the same? Even Copenhagen is not Sweden :-)

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sven_Hassel
